faculties_accepted: Faculty of Social Science (excluding School of Law and Nottingham University Business School)
module_restrictions: Postgraduate modules are not open to undergraduate exchange students.
Business modules are excluded from the exchange.
Law students should apply through NUS Law for the exchange at Nottingham Law School.
visa_info: Singapore citizens or citizens of countries on the UK non-visa nationals list can request entry to the UK as a Standard Visitor if their course of studies is less than 6 months. Student Visa is required for full-year exchange.

accommodations_info.university: Students apply online directly to the University Accommodation Office for university-allocated accommodation. Private rented accommodation is available.
accommodations_info.recommended_semester: Nottingham strongly recommends that Autumn or Spring semester students consider university-allocated accommodation as private landlords usually prefer one-year study students.
accommodations_info.private_accomm_warning: Students are STRONGLY ADVISED NOT to sign up for private rented accommodation until they have seen it in person.
accommodations_info.council_tax_info: One-semester students who wish to live in private rented accommodation should be aware that they may be charged Council Tax of up to Â£200.

university_description: The University of Nottingham is a public research university in Nottingham, United Kingdom. It was founded in 1881 and is a member of the Russell Group of leading British universities.
